word:
Then to that company of attentive hearers the apostle preached Christ--His life, His miracles, His betrayal and crucifixion, His resurrection and ascension, and His work in heaven as man's representative and advocate. As Peter pointed those present to Jesus as the sinner's only hope, he 
                                                                           139
himself understood more fully the meaning of the vision he had seen, and his heart glowed with the spirit of the truth that he was presenting.
